About

I'm a Baltimore-based software developer with experience building web and mobile products. I work hard to improve my skills and gain new ones as often as I can.

I'm about to graduate from college, and am currently looking for full-time employment when I do. I'm available to relocate, and I'd like to work remotely if possible. If you're hiring, send me an email below!

Contact Me

I can be reached by email (jneal1992 [at] gmail.com). I'm also on Twitter. And I'm on Github.

Shermansmarch

A port of an existing and incomplete Flash application to HTML5 using the EaselJS library.

  • Client: Anne Rubin and Kelley Bell
  • Date: September 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Nasdome

Ported an existing XCode project to Unity3D and continued to extend functionality. Final release expected in February 2015.

  • Client: National Academy of Sciences
  • Date: November 2014
  • Service: Mobile Development

Deku

Created a small social networking site from scratch using Flask, Bootstrap and other libraries. A university software engineering project.

  • Client: Shawn Squire
  • Date: February 2014
  • Service: Web Development
